democracy.title: Democracy
democracy.description: Strengthening democratic institutions and ensuring fair representation for all citizens. We believe in building a transparent and accountable government that serves its people.

education.title: Education
education.description: Investing in quality education and youth empowerment to build a brighter future. We focus on creating opportunities for learning and growth at all levels.

economy.title: Economy
economy.description: Building a strong and inclusive economy for all Cameroonians through sustainable development and innovative policies that promote growth and prosperity.

education.title: Education
education.description: Quality education accessible to all Cameroonians.
education.content:
Our vision for education in Cameroon is based on equal opportunities and academic excellence. We propose a comprehensive program that includes:

Modernization of school infrastructure in all regions of the country, ensuring an optimal learning environment for every student.

Strengthening teacher training, with continuous professional development programs and incentives to attract the best talent to the teaching profession.

Integration of digital technologies in education, preparing our youth for the challenges of the 21st century while giving them access to global educational resources.

Revision of school curricula to include practical and entrepreneurial skills, ensuring better alignment between education and labor market needs.

Development of partnerships with international institutions to facilitate academic exchanges and access to higher education opportunities abroad.

economy.title: Economy
economy.description: Sustainable economic development and job creation.
economy.content:
Our economic program aims to transform Cameroon into a regional economic power. We focus on:

Diversification of the economy beyond traditional sectors, with a particular emphasis on innovation and emerging technologies.

Creation of a business-friendly environment, with administrative reforms to facilitate the creation and development of SMEs.

Development of essential infrastructure to support economic growth.

Promotion of regional and international trade partnerships.

Implementation of policies to attract foreign investment while protecting local interests.

governance.title: Governance
governance.description: Transparent and effective governance for all.
governance.content:
Our governance program focuses on building strong, accountable institutions that serve all citizens:

Implementation of digital governance solutions to improve service delivery and reduce corruption.

Strengthening of local governance structures to ensure better representation.

Reform of administrative procedures to increase efficiency and transparency.

Enhancement of citizen participation in decision-making processes.

Modernization of public services through technology and training.

health.title: Healthcare
health.description: Quality healthcare accessible to every Cameroonian.
health.content:
Our health program aims to revolutionize healthcare delivery in Cameroon:

Modernization of healthcare facilities across all regions.

Implementation of universal health coverage.

Strengthening of preventive healthcare programs.

Improvement of maternal and child health services.

Development of medical training programs to increase healthcare workforce.

infrastructure.title: Infrastructure
infrastructure.content:
Our infrastructure program focuses on building the foundation for economic growth:

Development of modern transportation networks across the country.

Expansion of reliable electricity and water supply.

Implementation of digital infrastructure for improved connectivity.

Construction of sustainable urban development projects.

Modernization of agricultural infrastructure to support food security.

youth.title: Youth Empowerment
youth.description: Empowering the next generation of leaders.
youth.content:
Our youth program aims to create opportunities for young Cameroonians:

Creation of job training and entrepreneurship programs.

Establishment of youth innovation centers across the country.

Development of sports and cultural facilities.

Implementation of mentorship and leadership programs.

Support for youth-led initiatives and startups.

birth.title: Birth
birth.description: Cabral Libii Li Ngue was born in Douala, Cameroon, into a modest family. His upbringing instilled in him a strong sense of determination and a desire to contribute to Cameroon's development.

university.title: University Studies
university.description: Cabral pursued higher education at the University of Yaoundé II, earning a degree in Law and Political Science. He also specialized in journalism and communication, preparing for a career in both academia and media.

journalist.title: Journalist and Academic
journalist.description: Cabral worked as a journalist and became known for addressing socio-political issues in Cameroon. Simultaneously, he taught public communication and political science, influencing a generation of students with his reformist ideas.

youth.title: Advocate for Youth Engagement
youth.description: Cabral focused on initiatives to engage young Cameroonians in civic activities. He began organizing forums and programs to educate youths about governance and their role in political processes.

candidate.title: Presidential Candidate Preparation
candidate.description: Libii announced his intention to run for president, representing the Univers party. He started the "11 Million Citizens" campaign, aiming to mobilize young voters and bring attention to the underrepresentation of youth in Cameroonian politics.

election.title: 2018 Presidential Election
election.description: Cabral Libii ran in the Cameroonian presidential election, earning third place with approximately 6.28% of the votes. His campaign emphasized economic reform, transparency, and youth empowerment, gaining significant attention nationally and internationally.

present.title: Political and Social Advocate
present.description: After the election, Libii continued his political work, focusing on grassroots development and advocacy for democratic reforms. He remains active in promoting youth involvement in governance and addressing pressing issues like education, unemployment, and infrastructure.

campaign_launch.title: 2025 Campaign Launch
campaign_launch.content: Cabral Libii officially launches his 2025 presidential campaign with a grand ceremony in Yaoundé. The event brought together thousands of supporters from all regions of Cameroon, demonstrating the growing momentum behind his vision for change. During his powerful opening speech, Libii outlined his comprehensive plan for transforming Cameroon's governance, economy, and social systems. The launch event also featured cultural performances celebrating Cameroon's rich diversity and youth-led presentations highlighting innovative solutions for the country's development.

youth_meeting.title: Meeting with Youth
youth_meeting.content: An interactive session with young people about Cameroon's future turned into a powerful exchange of ideas and aspirations. The four-hour forum, held at the Yaoundé Conference Center, saw over 500 young leaders from universities, technical schools, and entrepreneurial backgrounds engage directly with Cabral Libii. Key topics included digital innovation, job creation, educational reform, and youth participation in governance. The session resulted in the formation of youth action committees across all regions and the launch of a digital platform for ongoing youth engagement in the campaign.

economic_program.title: Economic Program
economic_program.content: Detailed presentation of the economic development program reveals an innovative approach to Cameroon's economic transformation. The comprehensive plan focuses on five key pillars: digital economy development, agricultural modernization, infrastructure expansion, SME support, and industrial growth. Economic experts praised the program's realistic implementation timeline and its potential to create over 500,000 jobs in the first three years. The presentation included specific measures for reducing bureaucracy, attracting foreign investment, and promoting local entrepreneurship, with special emphasis on women and youth empowerment.
